byline: Peter O'Dowd, Shannon Mullen, David Brancaccio, Jonathan Zittrain, Sam Beard, Scott Tong, Katie Long and Jeremy Hobson
teaser: Wal-Mart is requiring its producers to report exactly which factories they work with at home and abroad. Google's Chief Information Officer tells us about working in New York versus Silicon Valley and his journey from Wall Street to the tech world. And, what's got the price of gold down 10 percent since Friday?
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, April 15, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Monday, April 15, 2013
